text: The men's discus throw event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 16 and 18 July. A 1.75 kg (junior implement) discus was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ehsan Hadadi ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Oleg
